color_order.docs:
Should be one of `rgb` (default) or `bgr`.

*See also: [Quad SPI Displays](https://esphome.io/components/display/qspi_dbi.html#configuration-variables)*

draw_rounding.docs:
**, int**: Caters for display chips that require partial drawing to be aligned to certain boundaries. Default is 2, must be a power of 2.

*See also: [Quad SPI Displays](https://esphome.io/components/display/qspi_dbi.html#configuration-variables)*

invert_colors.docs:
**, boolean**: With this boolean option you can invert the display colors.

*See also: [Quad SPI Displays](https://esphome.io/components/display/qspi_dbi.html#configuration-variables)*

transform.docs:
Transform the display presentation using hardware. All defaults are `false`. This option cannot be used with `rotation`.
  * **swap_xy** (*Optional*, boolean): If true, exchange the x and y axes. Not available for some chips
  
  * **mirror_x** (*Optional*, boolean): If true, mirror the x axis.
  
  * **mirror_y** (*Optional*, boolean): If true, mirror the y axis.
  
  

*See also: [Quad SPI Displays](https://esphome.io/components/display/qspi_dbi.html#configuration-variables)*
